skill_coverage_enhancement.title: Address Critical Skill Coverage Gaps
skill_coverage_enhancement.description: System has 15 skills with insufficient coverage
skill_coverage_enhancement.rationale: Multiple skills have fewer than 2 agents, creating single points of failure

skill_expertise_improvement.title: Improve Agent Skill Expertise
skill_expertise_improvement.description: System has 5 skills with low expertise ratings
skill_expertise_improvement.rationale: Low skill ratings indicate agents need additional training or experience

load_balancing_optimization.title: Optimize Load Distribution
load_balancing_optimization.rationale: Uneven load distribution leads to bottlenecks and inefficient resource usage

capacity_optimization.title: Optimize System Capacity
capacity_optimization.rationale: Low utilization indicates potential for capacity reduction or increased workload

address_skill_mismatch_failures.title: Address Skill Mismatch Issues
address_skill_mismatch_failures.description: System experiencing 11 instances of skill_mismatch failures
address_skill_mismatch_failures.rationale: skill_mismatch is the most common failure type, indicating systemic issues
